titleStmt.title: The Unhappy tayler, or, Loves fatal farewel being a tragical relation of one James Orde, a tayler who hang'd himself on Sunday morning in the new buildings near Lamb's Cunduit for love of a young maiden who slighted his courtship.

notesStmt.note: Imprint given by Wing gives name as J. Allein.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
